title: LF G3+ for clash
body:
Hey guys. 
as you know clash is just around the corner and was wondering if anyone would be interested in getting a head start and playing with each other. 

Would prefer having game times at around 10 am - 12 am and can work around those times. 
having comms is a must. So discord is preferred

currently looking for a TOP - ADC - Support - Jungle

Just pm at : fbi hood{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
